summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to enter into an Agreement with the Arboretum Foundation relating to the implementation of the Washington Park Arboretum - Pacific Connections Project; authorizing acceptance of funds from the Arboretum Foundation for such purpose; and increasing the expenditure authority in the Department of Parks and Recreation's 2007 Adopted Budget, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
